availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Tate ("Honest Dick" Asst. Sec of State)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, state official. Franklin County, Kentucky, native. Married Lucy J. Hawkins Tate in 1856. Father of Edmonia Tate. Appointed Assistant Secretary of State of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1854 to 1855 and from 1859 to 1863. Assistant Clerk to the Kentucky House of Representatives in Frankfort from 1865 to 1867.

bibl.p: James C. Klotter, "Tate, James W." in The Kentucky Encyclopedia, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 867-68.
